name: OmniPage Workflow File
summary: Learn about .XWF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XWF files created with earlier versions of OmniPage are not always compatible with newer versions of the program.

description: Workflow file created with OmniPage OCR software; used for streamlining document conversions by automating scanning, converting, and saving processes; may be a pre-built workflow or created by the user with the Workflow Assistant.
